021import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
022import net.kyori.adventure.text.serializer.legacy.LegacyComponentSerializer;
023import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.BukkitItemStack;
024import net.tnemc.item.component.impl.CustomNameComponent;
025import org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack;
026import org.bukkit.inventory.meta.ItemMeta;
027
028import java.util.Optional;
029
030/**
031 * BukkitCustomNameComponent
032 *
033 * @author creatorfromhell
034 * @since 0.2.0.0
035 */
036public class BukkitCustomNameComponent extends CustomNameComponent<BukkitItemStack, ItemStack> {
037
038  public BukkitCustomNameComponent() {
039
040  }
041
042  public BukkitCustomNameComponent(final Component customName) {
043
044    super(customName);
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * @param version the version being used when this check is called.
049   *
050   * @return true if this check is enabled for the version, otherwise false
051   * @since 0.2.0.0
052   */
053  @Override
054  public boolean enabled(final String version) {
055
056    return true;
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * @param serialized the serialized item stack to use
061   * @param item       the item that we should use to apply this applicator to.
062   *
063   * @return the updated item.
064   * @since 0.2.0.0
065   */
066  @Override
067  public ItemStack apply(final BukkitItemStack serialized, final ItemStack item) {
068
069    final ItemMeta meta = item.getItemMeta();
070    final Optional<BukkitCustomNameComponent> componentOptional = serialized.component(identifier());
071    if(meta != null && componentOptional.isPresent()) {
072
073      meta.setDisplayName(LegacyComponentSerializer.legacySection().serialize(componentOptional.get().customName()));
074    }
075    return item;
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * @param item       the item that we should use to deserialize.
080   * @param serialized the serialized item stack we should use to apply this deserializer to
081   *
082   * @return the updated serialized item.
083   * @since 0.2.0.0
084   */
085  @Override
086  public BukkitItemStack serialize(final ItemStack item, final BukkitItemStack serialized) {
087
088    final ItemMeta meta = item.getItemMeta();
089    if(meta != null && meta.hasDisplayName()) {
090
091      this.customName = LegacyComponentSerializer.legacySection().deserialize(meta.getDisplayName());
092
093      serialized.applyComponent(this);
094    }
095    return serialized;
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * Checks if this component applies to the specified item.
100   *
101   * @param item The item to check against.
102   *
103   * @return True if this component applies to the item, false otherwise.
104   * @since 0.2.0.0
105   */
106  @Override
107  public boolean appliesTo(final ItemStack item) {
108
109    return true;
110  }
111}
